Remove archetype/background/persona selection (user is Owner not GM)
User picks team after league is generated
Show assigned GM profile on confirmation screen
Dashboard loads from generated session storage data
My GM page shows actual GM data
constraints: Keep existing generator APIs and session storage patterns
Maintain backward compatibility with dev tools GM generation
